text: 42|45|arau tumi sihamtaka dekhibalai paba ye, sihamtaka jahannamara sanmukhata upasthita karaa haiche; sihamte apamanata aranata arasthata curakai ca'i thakiba; arau yisakale imana aniche te'omloke kiyamatara dina ka’ba, ‘niscaya sihamta ksatigrasta, yihamte nijara arau nija paraiyalabargara ksati sadhana karaiche’. Saradhana! Niscaya yalimasakala sthayi sastita nipatita thakiba.
